Post.title: Row size too large (> 8126) for mysql
Post._content:
### SQLSTATE[42000]: Syntax error or access violation: 1118 Row size too large (> 8126). Changing some columns to TEXT or BLOB or using ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC or ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED may help. In current row format, BLOB prefix of 768 bytes is stored inline.

### 
mysqlTEXTBLOBROW_FORMAT()DYNAMICCOMPRESSEDmysql
```
# 
show table status;
+--------+--------+---------+------------+------+----------------+-------------+
| Name   | Engine | Version | Row_format | Rows | Avg_row_length | Data_length |
+--------+--------+---------+------------+------+----------------+-------------+
| t_test | InnoDB |      10 | Dynamic    |    0 |              0 |       16384 |
+--------+--------+---------+------------+------+----------------+-------------+

# innodb
show variables like '%innodb_file_format%';
+--------------------------+-----------+
| Variable_name            | Value     |
+--------------------------+-----------+
| innodb_file_format       | Barracuda |
| innodb_file_format_check | ON        |
| innodb_file_format_max   | Barracuda |
+--------------------------+-----------+
```
<!--more-->
> mysqlinnodbblob/text(row)innodb


**innodbAntelope()Barracuda():**
  - AntelopeRedundantCompact
  - BarracudaDynamic() Compressed()
  
Antelopeinnodbinnodb pageInnoDB page(2)innodb page16k(16k - page header- page trailer) / 2(blob/text/varchar)InnoDB(off-page)(RedundantCompact)(blob/text/varchar)768innodb page

> innodb111812768()3innodb

BarracudainnodbROW_FORMATDYNAMIC20innodb pageblob(prefix index)pageblobpageROW_FORMATCOMPRESSEDinnodbpageKEY_BLOCK_SIZE

innodbblobpageblobblob16kblob1blobblobtext

====

### 1  Dynamic
innodbBarracudaDYNAMIC

```
SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format=Barracuda;

ALTER TABLE [tableName] ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

```


### 2  Compressed
innodbBarracudaCOMPRESSED30%-40%

```
SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format=Barracuda;

ALTER TABLE [tableName] ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED KEY_BLOCK_SIZE=8

```

### 3  

```
innodb_file_format=Barracuda

innodb_file_per_table=1
```

#### 3.1.2 
>stringsstrconv

- 

<font color=red>:strings.Join  strings.Split</font>
```
// x 
fmt.Println("Join: ", strings.Join([]string{"a", "b", "c"}, "-"))
//Join:  a-b-c

//Split:  [a b c d e]


// s, (), slice
func Fields(s string) []string

str := "nice to meet   you"
slice := strings.Fields(str) // [nice to meet you]
```
- 

<font color=red>:strings.Compare</font>
```go

fmt.Println(strings.Compare(string("hello"), string("haha")))  // 1
fmt.Println(strings.Compare(string("hello"), string("helloworld")))  // -1
fmt.Println(strings.Compare(string("hello"), string("hello")))  //0

// Compare:
func Compare(a, b string) int {
	if a == b {
		return 0
	}
	if a < b {
		return -1
	}
	return +1
}
```
- 

<font color=red>:strings.ContainsIndexLastIndexCount</font>

```
// ssubstr, true, false
func Contains(s, substr string) bool

fmt.Println(strings.Contains("hello word", "hell"))  // true
fmt.Println(strings.Contains("hello word", "hella"))  // false
fmt.Println(strings.Contains("", ""))  // true

// ssep, , -1
func Index(s, sep string) int

// ssep, , -1
func LastIndex(s, sep string) int

fmt.Println(strings.Index("abcdefga", "a")) //0
fmt.Println(strings.LastIndex("abcdefga", "a"))//7


// sep, sep, 1 + 
func Count(s, sep string) int

fmt.Println(strings.Count("hello", "l"))//2
fmt.Println(strings.Count("hello", ""))//6
```

- 
```
// scount, 
func Repeat(s string, count int) string

fmt.Println(strings.Repeat("hello", 2)) //hellohello
```

- 
```
// 
func Title(s string) string

fmt.Println(strings.Title("hello")) //Hello


// 
func ToLower(s string) string

fmt.Println(strings.ToLower("HELLO")) //hello


// 
func ToUpper(s string) string

fmt.Println(strings.ToUpper("hello")) //HELLO
```
- 
> <font color=red></font>

```
// prefix
func HasPrefix(s, prefix string) bool

fmt.Println(strings.HasPrefix("Golang", "Go"))  // true
fmt.Println(strings.HasPrefix("Golang", "go"))  // false
fmt.Println(strings.HasPrefix("Golang", "a"))  // false
fmt.Println(strings.HasPrefix("Golang", ""))  // true


// suffix, 
func HasSuffix(s, suffix string) bool

fmt.Println(strings.HasSuffix("Golang", "ang"))  // true
fmt.Println(strings.HasSuffix("Golang", "Ang"))  // false
fmt.Println(strings.HasSuffix("Golang", "bng"))  // false
fmt.Println(strings.HasSuffix("Golang", ""))  // true
```

- 
```
// scutset, 
func Trim(s string, cutset string) string

fmt.Println(strings.Trim("@hello word@","@")) // hello word
```

- 
```
// s, oldnewn0
func Replace(s, old, new string, n int) string


fmt.Println(strings.Replace("hello word","o","@",1)) // hell@ word
fmt.Println(strings.Replace("hello word","o","@",-1)) // hell@ w@rd
```

Post.title: nginx
Post._content:
## 1. nginx.conf 
```
#
user www-data;
pid /var/run/nginx.pid;

#nginxwebworderCPU
worker_processes auto; 

#worker,'ulimit -a'"too many open files"
worker_rlimit_nofile 100000; 
events {
    #worker
    worker_connections 65536; 
    #
    multi_accept on; 
    #,epolllinux2.6+
    use epoll; 
}
http {
    access_log off; #nginxIO(aka,YOLO)
    error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log crit; #nginx
    
  #HTTPTCP
    keepalive_timeout 10; #keep-alive
    keepalive_requests 1024;# HTTP ,  100
    tcp_nopush on; #
    tcp_nodelay on; #nginx--
    
  #Buffers size
    client_body_buffer_size  128k;# POST128k
    client_max_body_size  10m;#body413 413 0
    client_header_buffer_size    1k; # 1k
    large_client_header_buffers  4 4k; # 44k
    output_buffers  1 32k;# Nginx
    postpone_output  1460;#Nginx
    
   #
    client_header_timeout 10; #
    client_body_timeout 10; #()
    reset_timedout_connection on; #
    send_timeout 10; #
    
  #
    open_file_cache max=100000 inactive=20s; #
    open_file_cache_valid 30s; #open_file_cache
    open_file_cache_min_uses 2; #open_file_cache
    open_file_cache_errors on; #
    
  #Gzip
    gzip on; #gzip
    gzip_disable "msie6"; #
    gzip_proxied any; #any
    gzip_static on; #nginxgzip
    gzip_min_length 1000; #
    gzip_comp_level 6; #,1-10CPU
    gzip_types text/plain text/css application/json application/x-javascript text/xml application/xml application/xml+rss text/javascript; #
  
  #
    limit_conn_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=addr:5m; #key5m532K*532byte16K*564byte
    limit_conn addr 100; #keykeyaddr100IP100
    server_tokens off; #nginx
    sendfile on; #sendfile()TCP socket()Pre-sendfileread()write()sendfile()OSsendfile()read()write()(sendfile)
    
    default_type text/html; #MIME-type
    include /etc/nginx/mime.types; #
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
    include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*;
}
```

```
    reset_timedout_connection on; #
    send_timeout 10; #
    
  #
    open_file_cache max=100000 inactive=20s; #
    open_file_cache_valid 30s; #open_file_cache
    open_file_cache_min_uses 2; #open_file_cache
    open_file_cache_errors on; #
    
  #Gzip
    gzip on; #gzip
    gzip_disable "msie6"; #
    gzip_proxied any; #any
    gzip_static on; #nginxgzip
    gzip_min_length 1000; #
    gzip_comp_level 6; #,1-10CPU
    gzip_types text/plain text/css application/json application/x-javascript text/xml application/xml application/xml+rss text/javascript; #
  
  #
    limit_conn_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=addr:5m; #key5m532K*532byte16K*564byte
    limit_conn addr 100; #keykeyaddr100IP100
    server_tokens off; #nginx
    sendfile on; #sendfile()TCP socket()Pre-sendfileread()write()sendfile()OSsendfile()read()write()(sendfile)
    
    default_type text/html; #MIME-type
    include /etc/nginx/mime.types; #
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
    include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*;
}

```
```
pid = run/php-fpm.pid
#pidvar/run/php-fpm.pid

#var/log/php-fpm.log

log_level = notice
#. : alert, error, warning, notice, debug. : notice.

emergency_restart_threshold = 60
emergency_restart_interval = 60s
#emergency_restart_intervalSIGSEGVSIGBUSphp-cgi emergency_restart_thresholdphp-fpm

process_control_timeout = 0
#. : s(), m(), h(),  d() : s(). : 0.

daemonize = yes
#fpm,yesnoFPM 

listen = 127.0.0.1:9000
#fpmnginxphp: 'ip:port', 'port', '/path/to/unix/socket'. .

listen.backlog = -1
#backlog-1backloghttp://www.3gyou.cc/?p=41

listen.allowed_clients = 127.0.0.1
#FastCGIIPanyIPnginxFPMlistenIPany. 

listen.owner = www
listen.group = www
listen.mode = 0666
#unix sockettcp

user = www
group = www
#

pm = dynamic #pmstatic
#staticdynamicstaticpm.max_childrendynamic
pm.max_children #
pm.start_servers #
pm.min_spare_servers #
pm.max_spare_servers #

pm.max_requests = 1000
#. .  '0' .  PHP_FCGI_MAX_REQUESTS . : 0.

pm.status_path = /status
#FPM. , . : none. munin

ping.path = /ping
#FPMping. , ping. FPM.  (/)

ping.response = pong
#ping.  HTTP 200  text/plain . : pong.

request_terminate_timeout = 0
#. php.ini'max_execution_time'.  '0'  'Off'.502

request_slowlog_timeout = 10s
#PHP.  '0'  'Off'

slowlog = log/$pool.log.slow
#,request_slowlog_timeout

rlimit_files = 1024
#rlimit. : 1024 ulimit -nulimit -n 2048

rlimit_core = 0
#rlimit. : 'unlimited' 0. : .

chroot =
#Chroot. . , chroot.

chdir =
#Chdir. . : /chroot

catch_workers_output = yes
#stdoutstderr. , stdout  stderr FastCGI /dev/null . : .
```

Post.title: RabbitMQ
Post._content:
### Erlang
 
 
```$xslt
  
 # rpm --import http://binaries.erlang-solutions.com/debian/erlang_solutions.asc  
  
 # cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ 
  
 # wget http://binaries.erlang-solutions.com/rpm/centos/erlang_solutions.repo  
  
 # yum install esl-erlang  
```

<!--more-->
### esl-erlang-compat
```$xslt
# cd /tmp/  
  
# wget https://raw.github.com/jasonmcintosh/esl-erlang-compat/master/rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch/esl-erlang-compat-R14B-1.el6.noarch.rpm   
  
# yum install esl-erlang-compat-R14B-1.el6.noarch.rpm 
 

```

### RabbitMQ
 
 ```$xslt
 # cd /tmp 
 
 #  wget https://www.rabbitmq.com/releases/rabbitmq-server/v3.6.2/rabbitmq-server-3.6.2-1.noarch.rpm 
 
 # yum install rabbitmq-server-3.6.2-1.noarch.rpm 
```

  
RabbitMQ
 
 
 
### RabbitMQ
RabbitMQwebPlugin
DocumentationServerManagementhttp://www.rabbitmq.com/management.html
RabbitMQ
 
 
```$xslt
# rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management
```

 
### 
 
 ```$xslt
# rabbitmqctl  add_user leyue leyue100
# rabbitmqctl  set_user_tags leyue administrator
# rabbitmqctl  set_permissions -p / leyue ".*" ".*" ".*"
```

 
http://localhost:15672  
 
 
 
RabbitMQ
```$xslt
# service rabbitmq-server start  //

# service rabbitmq-server stop   //

#service rabbitmq-server restart //
```


 
....

### Q1 git pull/push

:
- 
- > git config --global credential.helper store

### Q2 gitpullrefusing to merge unrelated histories
> : git pull --allow-unrelated-histories

### Q3  error: cannot lock ref 'refs/remotes/origin/..': ref refs/remotes/origin/.. is at 1907...927a1c but expected 8a5b...04b8

:
``` 
# rm .git/refs/remotes/origin/dev
# git fetch

```
